thoughts.text: I think I should use the `google` command to find more information about the top 20 Python libraries for data science.

This information will be helpful in determining which libraries I should focus on learning and using.

- Review the search results to gain a better understanding of what each library does and which ones are most relevant to my needs
- Use this information to determine which libraries I should focus on learning and using
